name: All mech factories
author: Recessive
description:
Adds every mech factory to the game. Uses vanilla resources. Use workshop page for balance suggestions.

Mod includes:
- Eruptor factory
- Chaos array factory
- Eradicator constructor
- Lich constructor
- Reaper constructor
Also includes proper tech tree research, so each factory is researched off the last:
- Eruptor requires fortress mech factory for research
- Chaos array requires Eruptor factory for research
- Eradicator requires Chaos array factory for research
- Lich requires Revenant factory for research
- Reaper requires Lich constructor for research
